about_the_game:
Trapped in a mall, you and your partner turn to Texas hold 'em poker to pass the time. But here's the catch – each victory means your opponent must change outfits from the incredible range of stores around you. Unlock business attire, sports wear, clubbing outfits, swimwear, lingerie, and more as you dive into the intriguing stories and challenges of each character. Will you rise to the top, unlock the most coveted outfits, and leave your fashionable mark in Fashion Holiday?

Unleash your poker skills in "Fashion Holiday: A Game of Texas Hold 'Em," where a mall-bound evening sets the stage for playful matches against intriguing characters. With 32 stunning outfit choices, immerse yourself in light-hearted dialogue and stylish 4K art.

Features:
  • Partake in a mall-bound evening with heads-up limited Texas Hold 'Em poker at its core
  • Place your outfit choices on the line in intense matches against one of 4 intriguing characters
  • Outfits become the stakes, allowing you to explore 32 stunning options from nearby clothing stores
  • Experience memorable moments with light-hearted dialogue, forging friendships and maybe
    even romance
  • Immerse yourself in stylish and crystal-clear 4K art

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium (or similar AMD) 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
